# Context Pack - { Product } - L1

## Business Context

### Business Problem

(What is the core business problem that this product solves?)

### Vision

(What is our vision of the future, i.e., given the current state of technology/market and the trends, how would our target users be solving the problem in 5 years?)

(e.g.

Our vision is to use generative AI to make reading more fun and engaging for students - the adage â€œGenerative AI gives us a breakthrough ability to do this because we can dynamically generate unlimited age-appropriate content.

However, we simultaneously strive to make the reading process more academically rigorous by taking }

### How do we Win

(Given the status quo and our vision, how do we win against the current alternatives?)

(e.g.

Personalized and unlimited: Use gen AI to create unlimited age-relevant reading content for students.

Create engaging reading experiences:

Transgressive forms of media with the reading content including images, audio clips, and video
